        • crops.core.cio module

    crops.core.cio module¶

    check_path(path, typeofpath=None)[source]¶

    Returns full path if correct.

    Parameters

    • path (str) – Input (local) path.

    • typeofpath (str, optional) – The type of path, ‘dir’ or ‘file’, defaults to None.

    Raises

    • ValueError – When given typeofpath is neither ‘dir’ nor ‘file’.

    • argparse – If wrong path given.

    Returns

    Complete checked path.

    Return type

    str

    import_db(inpath, pdb_in=None)[source]¶

    Imports intervals database.

    Parameters

    • inpath (str) – Path to interval database used.

    • pdb_in (str, dict, optional) – Chain ID, defaults to None.

    Raises

    TypeError – When pdb_in is given and is neither a string nor a list of strings.

    Returns

    dict

    Return type

    A dictionary of intinterval.

    infix_gen(inpath, terms=False)[source]¶

    Returns filename tag for outputs.

    Parameters

    • inpath (str) – Path to interval database used.

    • terms (bool, optional) – Are only terminal ends discarded?, defaults to False.

    Returns

    Filename tag.

    Return type

    str

    outpath(globaldir, subdir=None, filename=None, mksubdir=False)[source]¶

    Returns the desired output filepath.

    Parameters

    • globaldir (str) – General output dir.

    • subdir (str, optional) – Additional subdirectory, defaults to None.

    • filename (str, optional.) – File name, defaults to None.

    • mksubdir (bool, optional) – Create directory if not existing, defaults to False.

    Raises

    FileNotFoundError – Directory does not exist.

    Returns

    Output filepath.

    Return type

    str

    parseseqfile(inpath, uniprot=None)[source]¶

    Returns dictionary containing Sequence.

    Parameters

    • inpath (str) – File path.

    • uniprot (str, dict, optional) – A dictionary of Uniprot codes, defaults to None

    Returns

    A dictionary containing parsed Sequence.

    Return type

    dict

    parsestrfile(STR_INPATH)[source]¶

    Returns dictionary containing gemmi structures and another one with the file names.

    Parameters

    STR_INPATH (str) – Either a directory or file path.

    Raises

    KeyError – More than one structure file containing same identifier.

    Return strdict

    A dictionary containing imported gemmi structures.

    Rtype strdict

    dict

    Return filedict

    A dictionary containing file names.

    Rtype filedict

    dict

    target_format(inpath, terms=False, th=0)[source]¶

    Returns extra information for .fasta headers.

    Parameters

    • inpath (str) – Path to interval database used.

    • terms (bool, optional) – Are only terminal ends discarded?, defaults to False.

    • th (int, float, optional) – Uniprot threshold, defaults to 0.

    Returns

    Extra information for .fasta headers

    Return type

    str
